description: Unique name
Name of bus to which store is attached.
Placeholder for store type. Not yet implemented.
Nominal energy capacity.
Switch to allow capacity e_nom to be extended in OPF.
If e_nom is extendable in OPF, set its minimum value.
If e_nom is extendable in OPF, set its maximum value (e.g. limited by technical potential).
Minimal value of e relative to e_nom for the OPF.
Maximal value of e relative to e_nom for the OPF.
Energy before the snapshots in the OPF.
Switch: if True, then e_initial is ignored and the initial energy is set to the final energy for the group of snapshots in the OPF.
active power set point (for PF)
reactive power set point (for PF)
power sign
Marginal cost of production of 1 MWh.
Capital cost of extending e_nom by 1 MWh.
Losses per hour to energy.
Inverter control type, supported types are: q_v (v1, v2, v3, v4, s_nom, power_factor, damper), fixed_cosphi (power_factor) , and cosphi_p (set_p1,  set_p2, s_nom, power_factor_min, p_ref) .
Power factor is default to 1 and can take values (1 = >  power_factor  >  0), required when the type_of_control_strategy is chosen 'fixed_cosphi' and or 'q_v'.
Inverter nominal apparent power, required when the type_of_control_strategy is chosen 'q_v'  or  'cosphi_p'.
Minimum voltage magnitude per unit for left curve of q_v controller, required when the type_of_control_strategy is chosen  'q_v'.
Maximum voltage magnitude per unit for left curve of q_v controller, required when the type_of_control_strategy is chosen  'q_v'.
Minimum voltage magnitude per unit for right curve of q_v controller, required when the type_of_control_strategy is chosen  'q_v'.
Maximum voltage magnitude per unit for right curve of q_v controller, required when the type_of_control_strategy is chosen  'q_v'.

Damper value is default to 1 but it can take values (1 > =  damper  >  0) and controls output of the voltage dependent controllers by changing its value in case controller is not converging,  (it is multiplied to the controller output ),  required when the type_of_control_strategy is chosen  'q_v' .

It is a set point  in percentage,  where it tells the controller to work with unity power factor if  (injected_power / s_nom)*100  <  set_p1, required when the type_of_control_strategy is  chosen  'cosphi_p'.

It is a set point in percentage,  where it tells controller to work with 'power_factor_min' if  (injected_power / s_nom)*100   >  set_p2,  required when the type_of_control_strategy is  chosen  'cosphi_p'.

It is a set point for power injection of inverter at which controller starts  applying power factor, for injections before this point controller operates with unity power, required when the type_of_control_strategy is  chosen  'cosphi_p'.
Minimum allowed power factor, required when the type_of_control_strategy is chosen  'cosphi_p'.
active power at bus (positive if net generation)
reactive power (positive if net generation)
Energy as calculated by the OPF.
Optimised nominal energy capacity outputed by OPF.
Shadow price of upper e_nom limit
Shadow price of lower e_nom limit
Shadow price of fixed energy level e_set
